New Records: Shohei Ohtani reached the 50-50 club with 50 home runs and 50 stolen bases
Yu Darvish became the first Japanese pitcher to reach 2,000 strikeouts
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a tying home run in the bottom of the ninth inning
Mookie Betts hit a walk-off home run in the bottom of the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Yu Darvish expressed gratitude to his teams and supporters for achieving the 2,000-strikeout milestone
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Dodgers' 6-5 victory over the Colorado Rockies kept them in the lead in the National League West
Shohei Ohtani improved his batting average to.301 and scored two runs to raise his season run total to 128
